channel.title: PI - Global item spawning
channel.description:
What i need help with is basically in the title. I can't quite figure out how to make items spawn globally. For example in runescape back in the days i'd grab Wine of zamorak off of the table and then wait for them to respawn again.
How and where would i add that into my server?
[IMG]http://i656.photobucket.com/albums/uu282/NEIL_tis_ma_name/spawn-1.jpg[/img]
I'd like the runes to respawn every 20 seconds after being picked up

item.title: PI - Global item spawning
